minor.comment: GroupedList: Added `hasMoreData` flag to `IGroup` for rendering a plus character for groups that have indeterminate counts.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: In order to protect customers that bundle 2 different versions of the same component on the page, we are moving the rules defined by fabric components to CSS modules. This first change only affects the `Toggle` and `Label` components, which have been updated to scope their rules inside of hash-safe class names. No existing class names (`ms-Toggle` for example) have been removed, so any customer customizations should continue to work as expected. This means if you render an old v1 Toggle with a new v2 Toggle compoennt, their class definitions will not conflict.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Dropdown: uncontrolled dropdowns now correctly set the selected item as expected. Test coverage added.

major.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
major.comment: Most utilities have moved to `@uifabric/utilities`. If you refer directly to things like `/lib/utilities/autobind` you will now need to pull them directly from that package, or from the `office-ui-fabric-react/lib/Utilities` top-level import which should continue to work as expected. We are planning to split up more chunks of Fabric into smaller packages that can imported separately, but will also continue to maintain the `office-ui-fabric-react` package and its top-level imports.

patch.comment: [ChoiceGroup][A11y]:Use aria-label instead of aria-description for choice group choice.

patch.comment: Fixed TextField clip issue

patch.author: Mike Wheaton <miwhea@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: When computing a cover style for the Image component, if the width and height props aren't provided it will now measure the element. The Image component now extends from BaseComponent to more safely handle refs.

patch.author: William Do <willdo@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Fixed typo in change log

patch.author: Yudma <yudma@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: [DropDown][A11y] Remove aria-controls label for drop down.

patch.comment: fixed an issue where the beak would not reposition

patch.author: Christopher Schleiden <cschleiden@live.de>

patch.comment: Adding css so that contextualmenu properly sizes for long text

patch.author: Ian Clanton-Thuon <iclantonthuon@outlook.com>
patch.comment: Including the "target" property in the Link component.

patch.author: joschect <joschect@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Layer used node/element.remove() which is not present in ie. This change has it use parentnode.removeChild(childnode) instead

patch.author: REDMOND\miclo <miclo@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Calendar: handle invalid starting dates

patch.author: William Do <do.william@yahoo.com>
patch.comment: fixes panel jump in chrome and safari

patch.author: Michael Loughry <miclo@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Fix text color of primary button on focus

patch.author: Yimin Wu <yimwu@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Focus: IE will now return false for elements that are not tabbable.

patch.author: joschect <joschect@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Adding icon enum

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Dropdown: The `data-is-focusable` attribute now gets set correctly on the .ms-Dropdown div container.

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Slider: adding up/down/home/end support.

minor.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
minor.comment: Layer/LayerHost: Now supports React context passing through. Also all Layers not nested within a LayerHost will be positioned fixed as currently, but will not be if nested within a LayerHost.

patch.author: Christopher Schleiden <cschleiden@live.de>
patch.comment: Pivot: Add space between text and count (if used) for PivotItem. Also fixes rtl display of text and count.

patch.author: REDMOND\miclo <miclo@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: Persona: remove unneeded width property from .ms-Persona-detail

patch.author: David Zearing <dzearing@microsoft.com>
patch.comment: DetailsList/SelectionZone: selection is no longer cleared when clicking on DIVs that have `tabIndex >= 0` or `role=button`.
Callout: Updating dismiss logic to be less sensitive to focus change on render.
CommandBar: added `max-width: 100%` to prevent horizontal scroll scenarios.
Updating project dependencies.

minor.comment: DatePicker: now renders correctly when scrolled down in Safari.

patch.comment: ContextualMenu: submenus now expand correctly again.
SelectionZone: removing infinite loop.

minor.comment: ContextualMenu: Allow users to specify FocusZone direction on ContextualMenus.
ContextualMenu: the `items` property has been deprecated in favor of providing `subMenuProps`.
SelectionZone: now supports data-selection-disabled flag to disable selection event handling at a particular place in the DOM.

patch.comment: Button: Hover styles now render correctly.

minor.comment: Dropdown: Fixing an issue causing Safari to avoid opening the items in scroll cases.
Updates the link to the asset license and clarifies that it covers both fonts and icons

patch.comment: Dropdown: removing horizontal overflow.
CommandBar: now uses `Icon` component.
Nav: now accepts `selectedKey` from props (if provided) as truth to derive selected link.

minor.comment: Dropdown: disabled now respects changes passed in.
Dropdown: removing horizontal overflow.

patch.comment: Button: Reduce specificity of selectors for Button modifier classes.
Callout: dismiss now correctly passes event args to onDismiss.
Dropdown: now only updates state when props are actually changed.
TextField: defaultValue no longer provides a warning.

LayerHost: Changing default LayerHost to render on a fixed position high zindex surface. Fixing a bug in the logic of determining if focus moves should cause Callout to dismiss (it shouldn't if the focused element is the callout target.) Removing max height from Dropdown ul/li.LayerHost: default host now renders on fixed high z-index surface.

minor.comment: DatePicker: factored out a Calendar component and moved the picker portion to render in a Callout.

patch.comment: DetailsList: clicking on an empty area of the page should clear the selection.
Persona: now shows correct presence status if presence is not provided.

minor.comment: Toggle: `label` property is now optional, and the labels within the toggle will not render if no text is provided.

Callout: Deprecate `targetElement` in favor of `target`, which takes an Element, a MouseEvent, or a string selector. This makes it a lot easier to use Callout for pointing to a target without setting up refs and potentially having timing issues.

patch.comment: Choicegroup: Now turns all choices disabled when `disabled` flag is set.
Image: now adjusts correctly with width/height changes.

minor.comment: Icon: Adding `None` value to `IconName` to support custom icons.
Slider: `type='button'` now added by the default to thumb button. Also added thumbButtonProps for mixing in settings on the thumb button.

patch.comment: Updates the CDN references to point to the new CDN location.

minor.comment: Nav: adding support for `selectedKey`.

patch.comment: Nav: adjusting selection band to be themePrimary.

minor.comment: Facepile: updating default behavior.
